Name: Armor Girl Simulator
About the game: Do you want to design your own female warriors from movies and games? With this application, you can design a female warrior as she appears in fantasy worlds with simple operations. With this app, you can change the body shape and combine a wide variety of parts to create your own unique female warrior art. You can also upload your artwork to the server and share it with other users around the world. You can also download the data of your Warrior Woman on the server and customize it to your own liking. You can freely choose the size of each part. You can also paint them with your favorite colors! Illustrations can be saved in PNG format. If you have any parts you would like to see added, please let us know! Saved image information will be saved on the device and cannot be restored if the application is uninstalled. The connection information with the server will be saved at the end of the app and will not be restored after the app is uninstalled.
